scenario_text.value: Well, that takes us down another level.

As far as I know, this is the lowest one. The
Master must be in some secret location.

It...doesn’t seem like there are any enemies
around. At least not right now.

If this is the lowest level, these must be
the last of them. Let me get a closer look.
Professor, wait! I’ll go with you!

I guess that settles it. Let’s all start
looking into things, including those murals.
